concept.title: AMF support for update timer data type to match 3GPP specifications (Feature f10005-01)
concept.shortdesc: This feature updates the timer data types to match the 3GPP specification.

conbody.p: The AMF timer unit is updated. The allowed values are:

plentry.pd: Specify timer unit of 1 deci-hour (6 minutes).

conbody.p: The data type and value range of timer non3gppAccessDeregistrationTimer is changed to the integer in the range of 0 to 31 in units of 2 seconds, deci-hour and minute.
The data type and value range of timer t3502 is changed to the integer in the range of 1 to 31 in units of 2 seconds, deci-hour and minute.
The data type and value range of timer t3512 is changed to the integer in the range of 0 to 31 in units of 10 hours,10 minutes, 2 seconds, 30 seconds, hour and minute.
